<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><B>THE QUAKER
LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN OF 1990 </B></FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(As Amended and Restated Effective as of September 1, 1996) </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE I</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>NAME AND PURPOSE</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Name</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Quaker Long Term Incentive Plan of 1990 (the &#147;Plan&#148;) is established by
The Quaker Oats Company (the &#147;Company&#148;). </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Purpose</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has established the Plan to promote the interests of the Company and its shareholders by providing officers and other key employees of the Company and its related
affiliates with additional incentive and the opportunity, through stock ownership, to increase their proprietary interest in the Company and their personal interest in its continued success and progress. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE II</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>DEFINITIONS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>General Definitions</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The following words and phrases, when used herein, unless otherwise
specifically defined or unless the context clearly indicates otherwise, shall have the following meanings: </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Affiliate</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any trade or business entity, or a predecessor of such entity, if
any, which is a member of a controlled group of business entities of which the Company is also a member. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Agreement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The document which evidences the grant of any Benefit under the
Plan and which sets forth the Benefit and the terms, conditions and provisions of, and restrictions relating to, such Benefit. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Benefit</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any benefit granted to a Participant under the Plan. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Board</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Board of Directors of the Company. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Change in Control</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Occurrence upon events described in Section 9.2.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Code</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, and including the regulations promulgated pursuant thereto. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Committee</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee described in Section
5.1. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Common Stock</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#146;s $5.00 par value common stock. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Company</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Quaker Oats Company. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Effective Date</U>. The date that the Plan is approved by the shareholders of the Company, which must occur within one year before or after original adoption by the Board. Any grants of Benefits
prior to the approval by the shareholders of the Company shall be void if such approval is not obtained. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Employee</U>. Any person employed by the Employer as an officer or key employee.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(l)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Employer</U>. The Company and all Affiliates. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(m)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Exchange Act</U>. The Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(n)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Fair Market
Value</U>. The mean between the high and low sales price of shares on the New York Stock Exchange (composite transactions) on a given date, or, in the absence of sales on a given date, the closing price (as so reported) on the New York Stock
Exchange on the last previous day on which a sale occurred prior to such date. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(o)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>ISO</U>. An Option that meets the requirements of Section 422A of the Code. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(p)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>NSO</U>. An Option that does not qualify as an ISO. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(q)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Option</U>. An
option to purchase Shares granted under ARTICLE XIII of the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(r)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Stock Based Award</U>. An award under ARTICLE XVIII that is valued in whole or in part by reference to, or is otherwise based on, Common Stock. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(s)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Participant</U>.
An individual who is granted a Benefit under the Plan. Benefits may be granted only to Employees. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(t)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Performance Share</U>. A Share awarded to a Participant under ARTICLE XVI of the Plan.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(u)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Performance Units</U>. A Benefit awarded to a Participant under ARTICLE XVII of the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Plan</U>. The Quaker Long Term Incentive Plan of 1990 and all amendments and supplements
thereto. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(w)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Restricted Stock</U>. Shares issued under ARTICLE XV of the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Rule 16b-3</U>. Rule 16b-3 promulgated by the SEC, as amended, or any successor rule in
effect from time to time. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(y)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>SEC</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Securities and Exchange Commission. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(z)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Share.</U>&nbsp;&nbsp;A share of Common Stock. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(aa)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Stock
Appreciation Right</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Benefit awarded to a Participant under ARTICLE XIV of the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Definitions</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to the above definitions, certain words and phrases used in
the Plan and any Agreement may be defined elsewhere in the Plan or in such Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE III</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>COMMON STOCK</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">3.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Number of
Shares</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The number of Shares which may be issued or sold or for which Options, Stock Appreciation Rights, or Performance Shares may be granted under the Plan shall be 26,000,000 Shares (after adjustment for the 1994 2-for-1 stock
split), subject to the provisions of Sections 3.2 and 3.3 of the Plan. Such Shares may be authorized but unissued Shares, Shares held in the treasury, or both. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Reusage</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;If an Option or Stock Appreciation Right expires or is terminated, surrendered, or
canceled without having been fully exercised, if Restricted Stock or Performance Shares are forfeited, or if any other grant results in any Shares not being issued, the Shares covered by such Option or Stock Appreciation Right, grant of Restricted
Stock, Performance Shares or other grant, as the case may be, shall again be available for use under the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">3.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Adjustments</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;If there is any change in the Common Stock of the Company by reason of any stock
dividend, spin-off, &nbsp;split-up, spin-out, recapitalization, merger, consolidation, reorganization, combination or exchange of Shares, the number of Stock Appreciation Rights and number and class of shares available for Options and grants of
Restricted Stock, Performance Shares and Other Stock Based Awards and the number of Shares subject to outstanding Options, Stock Appreciation Rights, grants of Restricted Stock and Performance Shares, and Other Stock Based Awards, and the price
thereof, as applicable, shall be appropriately adjusted by the Committee. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE IV</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ELIGIBILITY</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">The Participants and the Benefits they receive under the Plan shall be determined solely by the Committee. In
making its determinations, the Committee shall consider past, present and expected future contributions of Employees and Participants to the Employer. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE
V</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ADMINISTRATION</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Committee</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan shall be administered by the Committee (also known as the Compensation
Committee of the Board). The Committee shall consist of members of the Board, who shall not be eligible to participate in the Plan. The members of the Committee shall be appointed by and shall serve at the pleasure of the Board, which may from time
to time appoint members in substitution for members previously appointed and fill vacancies, however caused, in the Committee. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Authority</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms of the Plan, the Committee shall have complete authority to:
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;determine the individuals to whom Benefits are granted, the type and amounts of Benefits to be granted and the time of all such grants; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;determine the terms, conditions and provisions of, and
restrictions relating to, each Benefit granted; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;interpret and construe the Plan and all Agreements; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prescribe, amend and rescind rules and regulations relating to the Plan; </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;determine the
content and form of all Agreements; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;determine all questions relating to Benefits under the Plan; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;maintain accounts, records and ledgers relating to Benefits; </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;maintain records
concerning its decisions and proceedings; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;employ agents, attorneys, accountants or other persons for such purposes as the Committee considers necessary or desirable; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;take, at anytime, any action permitted by Section 9.1 irrespective
of whether any Change in Control has occurred or is imminent; and </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do and perform all acts which it may deem necessary or appropriate for the administration of the Plan and carry out the purposes of the Plan. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">5.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Determinations</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;All determinations of the Committee shall be final. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">5.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Delegation</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as required by Rule 16b-3 with respect to Benefits to individuals who are subject to Section 16 of the Exchange Act or as otherwise required for compliance with Rule
16b-3 or other applicable law, the Committee may delegate all or any part of its authority under the Plan to any Employee, Employees or committee. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE VI</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000"><U>AMENDMENT</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">6.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Power of Board</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as hereinafter provided, the Board shall have the sole right and power to amend the Plan at any time and from time to time. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">6.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Limitation</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Board may not amend the Plan, without approval of the shareholders of the Company: </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">in a manner which would increase the number of Shares which may be issued or sold or for which Options, Stock Appreciation Rights, or Performance Shares may be
granted under the plan; or </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">in a manner which would violate applicable law. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE VII</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000"><U>TERM AND TERMINATION</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">7.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Term</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan shall commence as of the Effective Date and, subject to the terms of the Plan, including those requiring approval by the shareholders of the Company and those limiting the
period over ISOs or any other Benefits may be granted, shall continue in full force and effect until December 31, 1998. <B></B> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">7.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Termination</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan may be terminated at any time by the Board. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE VIII</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>MODIFICATION OR TERMINATION OF BENEFITS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">8.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>General</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of Section 8.2, the amendment or termination of the Plan
shall not adversely affect a Participant&#146;s right to any Benefit granted prior to such amendment or termination. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">8.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Committee&#146;s Right</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Benefit granted may be converted, modified, forfeited or
canceled, in whole or in part, by the Committee if and to the extent permitted in the Plan or applicable Agreement or with the consent of the Participant to whom such Benefit was granted. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE
IX</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>CHANGE IN CONTROL</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">9.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Benefit Cancellation and Payment.</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <U>Options</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a Change in
Control, Options outstanding on the date on which the Change in Control occurs shall be canceled, and an immediate lump sum cash payment shall be paid to the Participant equal to the product of (1) the higher of (i) the closing price of the Common
Stock as reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Index on or nearest the date of payment (or, if not listed on such exchange, on a nationally recognized exchange or quotation system on which trading volume in the Common Stock is highest),
or (ii) the highest per Share price for the Common Stock actually paid in connection with the Change in Control, over the per Share Option price of each such Option held (whether or not then fully exercisable), and (2) the number of Shares covered
by each such Option. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Stock Appreciation Rights</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, Stock Appreciation Rights outstanding on the date on which the Change in Control occurs shall be canceled, and an
immediate lump sum cash payment shall be paid to the Participant equal to the product of (1) the higher of (i) the closing price of the Common Stock as reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Index on or nearest the date of payment (or, if
not listed on such exchange, on a nationally recognized exchange or quotation system on which trading volume in the Common Stock is highest), or (ii) the highest per Share price for the Common Stock actually paid in connection with the Change in
Control, over the Fair Market Value of one Share on the date on which the Stock Appreciation Right was granted, and (2) the number of such Stock Appreciation Rights held. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Restricted Stock</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a
Change in Control, Restricted Stock outstanding on the date on which the Change in Control occurs shall be canceled and an immediate lump sum cash payment shall be paid to the Participant equal to the product of (1) the higher (i) the closing price
of Common Stock as reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Index on or nearest the date of payment (or, if not listed on such exchange, on a nationally recognized exchange or quotation system on which trading volume in the Common Stock is
highest) or (ii) the highest per share price for Common Stock actually paid in connection with the Change in Control and (2) the number of Shares of such Restricted Stock; plus the value of any related Cash Award relating to such Restricted Stock.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Performance Shares</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, any Performance Shares previously granted, but still considered outstanding (as a right to received Shares or cash equal to
the Fair Market Value of such Shares at a future date), shall be canceled and any profit and/or performance objectives with </FONT>
</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">respect to such Performance Shares shall be deemed to have been attained to the full and maximum extent; and an immediate lump sum cash
payment shall be paid to the Participant in an amount determined in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Performance Units</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, any
Performance Units previously granted, but still considered outstanding (as a right to receive cash at a future date), shall be canceled and any profit and/or performance objectives with respect to such Performance Units shall be deemed to have been
attained to the full and maximum extent; and an immediate lump sum cash payment shall be paid to the Participant in an amount determined in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Stock
Based Awards and other Benefits</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of a Change in Control, Other Stock Based Awards or other Benefits previously granted under the Plan, but still considered outstanding, shall be canceled and an immediate lump sum
cash payment shall be paid to the Participant in an amount determined in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Tax Penalties</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the making of payments pursuant to the foregoing paragraphs
of this Section 9.1 would subject the Participant to an excise tax under Section 4999 of the Code, or would result in the Company&#146;s loss of a federal income tax deduction for those payments (either of these consequences is referred to
individually herein as a &#147;Tax Penalty&#148;), then the Company shall reduce the amount of Benefits to be canceled to the extent necessary to avoid the imposition of such Tax Penalty, and shall establish procedures necessary to maintain for the
Participants any form of benefit which may be provided under the Plan so that such Participant will be in the same financial position with respect to those Benefits not canceled as he would have been in the ordinary course, absent a Change in
Control and assuming his continued employment; except that the foregoing provisions of this paragraph (g), with respect to the cancellation of Benefits, shall not apply if such Participant (i) is entitled to a tax reimbursement for such Tax Penalty
under any other agreement, plan or program of the Company, or (ii) may disclaim any portion of or all payments to be made pursuant to or under any other agreement, plan or program of the Company in order to avoid such Tax Penalty. Disagreements as
to whether payments pursuant to the foregoing would result in the imposition of a Tax Penalty shall be resolved by an opinion of counsel chosen by the Participant and reasonably satisfactory to the Company. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">9.2</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>Change in Control</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;A &#147;Change in Control&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred if: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any &#147;Person,&#148; which shall
mean a &#147;person&#148; as such term is used in Sections 13(d) and 14(d) of the Exchange Act (other than the Company, any </FONT>
</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">trustee or other fiduciary holding securities under an employee benefit plan of the Company, or any company owned, directly or indirectly, by
the stockholders of the Company in substantially the same proportions as their ownership of stock of the Company), is or becomes the &#147;beneficial owner&#148; (as defined in Rule 13d-3 under the Exchange Act), directly or indirectly, of
securities of the Company representing 30% or more of the combined voting power of the Company&#146;s then outstanding voting securities; provided, however, that this paragraph &nbsp;(a) shall not apply to any Person who becomes such a beneficial
owner of such Company securities pursuant to an agreement with the Company approved by the Board, entered into before such Person has become such a beneficial owner of Company securities representing 5% or more of the combined voting power of the
Company&#146;s then outstanding voting securities; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;during any period of 24 consecutive months (not including any period prior to September 11, 1996), individuals, who at the beginning of such period constitute the Board, and any new director (other than a
director designated by a Person who has entered into an agreement with the Company to effect a transaction described in paragraph (a), (c) (2) or (d) of this Section) whose election by the Board, or whose nomination for election by the
Company&#146;s stockholders, was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds (2/3) of the directors before the beginning of the period cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority thereof; </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the stockholders of the Company
approve (1) a plan of complete liquidation of the Company or
&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;the&nbsp;sale&nbsp;or&nbsp;disposition&nbsp;by&nbsp;the&nbsp;Company&nbsp;of&nbsp;allor&nbsp;substantially&nbsp;all&nbsp;of&nbsp;the&nbsp;Company&#146;s&nbsp;assets&nbsp;unless&nbsp;the&nbsp;acquirer&nbsp;of&nbsp;the&nbsp;assets
&nbsp;or&nbsp;its&nbsp;directors&nbsp;shall&nbsp;meet&nbsp;the&nbsp;conditions&nbsp;for&nbsp;a&nbsp;merger&nbsp;or&nbsp;consolidation&nbsp;in&nbsp;subparagraphs (d)&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;or&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;; or </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the stockholders of the Company
approve a merger or consolidation of the Company with any other company other than: </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(1)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">such a merger or consolidation which would result in the voting securities of the Company outstanding immediately prior thereto continuing to represent (either by
remaining outstanding or by being converted into voting securities of the surviving entity) more than 70% of the combined voting power of the Company&#146;s or such surviving entity&#146;s outstanding voting securities immediately after such merger
or consolidation; or </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(2)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">such a merger or consolidation which would result in the directors of the Company who were directors immediately prior thereto continuing to constitute at least 50%
of the directors of the surviving entity immediately after such merger or consolidation. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">In this paragraph (d),
&#147;surviving entity&#148; shall mean only an entity in which all of the Company&#146;s stockholders immediately before such merger or consolidation become stockholders by the terms of such merger or consolidation, and the phrase &#147;directors
of the Company who were directors immediately prior thereto&#148; shall include only individuals who were directors of the Company at the beginning of the 24 consecutive month period preceding the date of such merger or consolidation, or who were
new directors (other than any director designated by a Person who has entered into an agreement with the Company to effect a transaction described in paragraph (a), (c) (2), (d) (1) or (d) (2) of this Section) whose election by the Board, or whose
nomination for election by the Company&#146;s stockholders, was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds (2/3) of the directors before the beginning of such period. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE X</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>AGREEMENTS AND CERTAIN BENEFITS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">10.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Grant Evidenced by Agreement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The grant of any Benefit under the Plan may be evidenced by an Agreement which shall describe the specific Benefit granted
and the terms and conditions of the Benefit. The granting of any Benefit may be subject to, and conditioned upon, the recipient&#146;s execution of any Agreement required by the Committee. Except as otherwise provided in an Agreement, all
capitalized terms used in the Agreement shall have the same meaning as in the Plan, and the Agreement shall be subject to all of the terms of the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">10.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Provisions of Agreement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Agreement shall contain such provisions that the Committee
shall determine to be necessary, desirable and appropriate for the Benefit granted. Each Agreement may include, but shall not be limited to, the following with respect to any Benefit: description of the type of Benefit; the Benefit&#146;s duration;
its transferability; if an Option, the exercise price, the exercise period and the person or persons who may exercise the Option; the effect upon such Benefit of the Participant&#146;s death or termination of employment; the Benefit&#146;s
conditions; when, if and how any Benefit may be forfeited, converted into another Benefit, modified, exchanged for another Benefit, or replaced; and the restrictions on any Shares purchased or granted under the Plan. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">10.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Certain
Benefits</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Benefit granted to an individual who is subject to Section 16 of the Exchange Act shall not be transferable other than by will or the laws of descent and distribution and shall be exercisable during his lifetime only by
him, his guardian or his legal representative. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE
XI</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>REPLACEMENT AND TANDEM AWARDS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">11.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Replacement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may permit a Participant to elect to
surrender a Benefit in exchange for a new Benefit. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">11.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Tandem Awards</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Benefits may be granted by the Committee in tandem. However, no Benefit may be granted in tandem with an ISO except a Stock Appreciation Right. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XII</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>PAYMENT, DIVIDENDS, DEFERRAL AND WITHHOLDING</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">12.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Payment</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the exercise of an Option or in the case of any
other Benefit that requires a payment to the Company, the amount due the Company is to be paid: </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(a) in cash; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b) by the tender to the Company of Shares owned by the Participant and registered his name having a Fair Market Value
equal to the amount due to the Company; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(c) in other property, rights and credits, including the Participant&#146;s promissory note; or </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(d) by any combination of the payment methods specified in (a), (b) and (c) above. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">Notwithstanding the foregoing, any method of payment other than (a) may be
used only with the consent of the Committee, or if and to the extent so provided in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">12.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Dividend Equivalents</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Grants of Benefits in Shares or Share equivalents may include dividend
equivalent payments or dividend credit rights. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">12.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Deferral</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The right to receive any Benefit under the Plan may, at the request of the Participant, be deferred for such period and upon such terms as the Committee shall determine, which
may include crediting of interest on deferrals of cash and crediting of dividends on deferrals denominated in Shares. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">12.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Withholding</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company, at the time any distribution is made under the Plan, whether in
cash or in Shares, may withhold from such distribution any amount necessary to satisfy federal, state and local tax withholding requirements with respect to such distribution. Such withholding may be in cash or in Shares. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE
XIII</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>OPTIONS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">13.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Types of Options</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is intended that both ISOs and NSOs may be granted by the Committee
under the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">13.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Shares for ISOs</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The number of Shares for which ISOs may be granted on or after the Effective Date shall not exceed 26,000,000 Shares, subject to the overall Plan limitations, permitted
reusage and adjustments provided for in ARTICLE III. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">13.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Grant of Options and Option Price</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Option must be granted to an Employee and must be granted no later than December 31, 1998. No single employee may be granted more than 1,000,000
Options (after adjustment for the 1994 2-for-1 stock split) during any Fiscal Year of the Company. The purchase price for Shares under any Option shall be no less than the Fair Market Value of the Shares at the time the Option is granted.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">13.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Early Termination
of Option.</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Termination of Employment</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;All rights to exercise an Option terminate when the Participant&#146;s employment terminates for any reason other than his death or retirement. Transfer from the
Company to an Affiliate, or vice versa, or from one Affiliate to another, shall not be deemed termination of employment. The Committee shall have the authority to determine in each case whether an authorized leave of absence or absence on military
or government service shall be deemed a termination of employment for purpose of this paragraph (a). </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Death or Retirement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective for Options granted after November 9, 1994, if
a Participant dies while an Employee or his employment is terminated because of retirement, his Option shall terminate within a period not exceeding five years following his death or retirement, but not later than the date the Option expires
pursuant to its terms. The terms of Options outstanding, except for those Options intended to qualify as an ISO, may also be amended at anytime by the Committee or the Board to extend the Option&#146;s duration period following a Participant&#146;s
death or retirement, subject to the limitations stated in the preceding sentence. In the meantime, subject to the limitations in the applicable Agreement, it may be exercised by the Participant, the executors or administrators of his estate, or by
his legatee or heirs. &#147;Retirement&#148; shall mean termination of employment at age 55 for older for reasons other than death. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">13.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Requirements</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The terms of each Option which is intended to qualify as an ISO shall
meet all requirements of Section 422 of the Code. The terms of each NSO shall provide that such Option will not be treated as an ISO. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">13.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Determination by Committee</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as otherwise provided in Section 13.2 through Section 13.5, the terms of all Options shall be determined by the Committee. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XIV</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">14.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Description</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may from time to time grant Stock Appreciation Rights. Upon
electing to receive payment of a Stock Appreciation Right, a Participant shall receive an amount in cash, in Common Stock or in any combination thereof, as the Committee shall determine, equal to the amount, if any, by which the Fair Market Value of
one Share on the date on which such election is made exceeds the Fair Market Value of one Share on the date on which the Stock Appreciation Right was granted. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">14.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Grant of Tandem Award</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may grant a Stock Appreciation Right in tandem with
another Benefit, in which case: the exercise of the other Benefit shall cause a correlative reduction in Stock Appreciation Rights standing to a Participant&#146;s credit which were granted in tandem with the other Benefit, and the payment of a
Stock Appreciation Right shall cause a correlative reduction of the Shares under such other Benefit. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">14.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>ISO Tandem Award</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;When a Stock Appreciation Right is granted in tandem with ISO, it shall
have such terms and conditions as shall be required for the ISO with which it is granted in tandem to qualify as an ISO. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">14.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Payment of Award</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Stock Appreciation Right shall be paid, to the extent payment is elected
by the Participant (and is otherwise due and payable), as soon as practicable after the date on which such election is made. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XV</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000"><U>RESTRICTED STOCK</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">15.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Description</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may grant Benefits in Shares available under ARTICLE III of the Plan as Restricted Stock. Shares of Restricted Stock shall be issued at the time of the grant
but shall be subject to forfeiture until provided otherwise in the applicable Agreement or the Plan. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">15.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Terms and Conditions of Restricted Stock Awards</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;All Shares of Restricted Stock shall be
subject to the following terms and conditions, and to such other terms and conditions as may be provided under the Agreements described in paragraph (f) next below: </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Payment of Par Value</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee, in its discretion, may condition any grant of Shares of Restricted Stock on payment by the Participant to the Company of an amount not in excess of the
par value of such Shares. If any such shares are subsequently forfeited by the Participant, the Company shall pay an equivalent amount to the Participant as soon as practicable after the forfeiture. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Restricted
Period</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Shares of Restricted Stock granted to a Participant may not be sold, assigned, transferred, pledged or otherwise encumbered during a &#147;Restricted Period&#148; commencing on the date of the grant and ending on such date as
the Committee may designate, subject to the following: </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may, at any time and in its sole discretion, reduce or terminate the Restricted Period with respect to any outstanding Shares of Restricted Stock, any accrued dividends in accordance
with paragraph (g) below, and any corresponding Cash Award pursuant to Section 15.3. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Restricted Period applicable to any Participant&#146;s Shares of Restricted Stock shall
end as of the date on which the Participant&#146;s employment with the Company and its Affiliates is terminated by reason of the Participant&#146;s death, physical or mental disability (as determined by the Committee), or for such other reasons as
the Committee may provide. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may, at any time, and in its sole discretion, allow a Participant to use his Restricted Stock during the Restricted Period as payment of the Option price (in accordance with Section 12.1) for
Options which he has been granted. In such an event, a number of the Shares issued upon the exercise of the Option, equal to the number of Shares of Restricted Stock used as payment therefore, shall be subject to the same restrictions as the
Restricted Stock so used, plus any additional restrictions that may be imposed by the Committee. Such terms and conditions relating to such use of Restricted Stock shall be provided under the Agreements described in paragraph (f) of this Section.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Transfer of Restricted Stock</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;At the end of the Restricted Period applicable to any Restricted Stock, such Shares, any accrued dividends and any corresponding Cash Award, will be
transferred free of all restrictions to the Participant (or, to the Participant&#146;s legal representative, beneficiary or heir). </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Forfeitures</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to paragraph 15.2(b), a Participant whose employment
with the Company and its Affiliates is terminated prior to the last day of the applicable Restricted Period shall forfeit all shares of Restricted Stock, and any accrued dividends, and any corresponding Cash Award. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Certificate Deposited With
Company</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each certificate issued in respect of Shares of Restricted Stock granted to a Participant under the Plan shall be registered in the name of the Participant and deposited, together with a stock power endorsed in blank, with
the Company. At the discretion of the Committee, any such certificates may be deposited in a bank designated by the Committee. Each such certificate shall bear the following (or a similar) legend: </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:10%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#147;The transferability of this certificate and the shares
of stock represented hereby are subject to the terms and conditions (including forfeitures) contained in The Quaker Long Term Incentive Plan of 1990 and an Agreement entered into between the registered owner and The Quaker Oats Company. A copy of
the Plan and Agreement is on file in the office of the Secretary of The Quaker Oats Company, 321 North Clark Street, Chicago, Illinois 60610.&#148; </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Restricted Stock Agreement</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Participant shall enter into an Agreement
with the Company in a form specified by the Committee and containing such additional terms and conditions, if any, as the Committee in its sole discretion shall determine, which are not inconsistent with the provisions of the Plan. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Dividends</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Regular cash dividends payable with respect to shares of Restricted Stock shall, in accordance with the terms of the applicable Agreement, be paid to the Participant currently
or accrued. If dividends are accrued, interest may be payable on such dividends at such rate, if any, as is established from time to time by the Committee. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Substitution of Rights</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the end of the Restricted Period with
respect to any Shares of Restricted Stock awarded to a Participant, the Committee may, with the consent of the Participant, substitute an unsecured obligation of the Company to pay cash or stock (on such reasonable terms and conditions as the
Committee may, in its sole discretion, determine) in lieu of its obligations under this ARTICLE XV to deliver unrestricted Shares plus accrued dividends. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Stockholder Rights</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the foregoing restrictions, each Participant
shall have all the rights of a stockholder with respect to Shares of Restricted Stock including, but not limited to, the right to vote such Shares. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">15.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Cash Awards and Restricted Stock</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee, at the time it grants Restricted Stock to a
Participant or at any time thereafter may grant a corresponding Cash Award which will entitle the Participant to receive cash as of the date as of which the Restricted Stock is transferred to him pursuant to paragraph 15.2(c), in an amount which is
not in excess of 200 percent of the Fair Market Value of the Restricted Stock as of that </FONT>
</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">date. Any such Cash Award shall be in addition to the Participant&#146;s rights to the Shares of Restricted Stock and shall be subject to
such additional terms and conditions, if any, as the Committee determines which are not inconsistent with the terms and conditions of the Plan. The Committee may, at any time, grant unrestricted Shares (in lieu of such a Cash Award and subject to
the limitations thereof) to any participant under the Plan subject to such terms and conditions as the Committee may determine. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XVI</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000"><U>PERFORMANCE SHARES</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">16.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Description</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance Shares are the right of an individual to whom a grant of such Shares is made to receive Shares or cash equal to the Fair Market Value of such Shares at a future
date in accordance with the terms of such grant. Generally, such right shall be based upon the attainment of profit and/or performance objectives. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">16.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Grant</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may grant an award of Performance Shares. The number of Performance
Shares and the terms and conditions of the grant shall be set forth in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XVII</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>PERFORMANCE UNITS</U> </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">17.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Description</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance Units are the right of an individual to whom a grant of such Units is made to receive cash at a future date in accordance with the terms of such grant. Generally,
such right shall be based upon the attainment of profit and/or performance objectives. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">17.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Grant</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may grant an award of Performance Units. The number of Performance Units and the terms and conditions of the grant shall be set forth
in the applicable Agreement. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE XVIII</U>
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>OTHER STOCK BASED AWARDS AND OTHER BENEFITS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">18.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Stock Based Awards</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall have the right to
grant Other Stock Based Awards which may include, without limitation, the grant of Shares based on certain conditions, the payment of cash based on the performance of the Common Stock, and the grant of securities convertible into Shares.
</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">18.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other
Benefits</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall have the right to provide types of Benefits under the Plan in addition to those specifically listed, if the Committee believes that such Benefits would further the purposes for which the Plan was
established. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>ARTICLE
XIX</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><U>MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS</U> </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">19.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Underscored References</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The underscored references contained in
the Plan are included only for convenience, and they shall not be construed as a part of the Plan or in any respect affecting or modifying its provisions. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">19.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Number and Gender</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The masculine and neuter, wherever used in the Plan, shall refer to
either the masculine, neuter or feminine; and, unless the context otherwise requires, the singular shall include the plural and the plural the singular. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">19.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Governing Law</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Plan shall be construed and administered in accordance with the laws of
the State of Illinois. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">19.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Purchase for Investment</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may require each person purchasing Shares pursuant to an Option or other award under the Plan to represent to and agree with the Company in writing
that such person is acquiring the Shares for investment and without a view to distribution or resale. The certificates for such Shares may include any legend which the Committee deems appropriate to reflect any restrictions on transfer. All
certificates for Shares delivered under the Plan shall be subject to such stock-transfer orders and other restrictions as the Committee may deem advisable under all applicable laws, rules and regulations, and the Committee may cause a legend or
legends to be put on any such certificates to make appropriate reference to such restrictions. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">19.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>No Employment Contract</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The adoption of the Plan or the granting of a Benefit shall not confer upon any Employee any right to continued employment nor
shall it interfere in any way with the right of the Employer to terminate the employment of any of its Employees at any time. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">19.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>No Effect on Other Benefits</U>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The receipt of Benefits under the Plan shall have no effect on
any benefits to which a Participant may be entitled from the Employer, under another plan or otherwise, or preclude a Participant from receiving any such benefits. </FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Program is executed by a duly authorized officer of the Company. </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"></TD></TR>

<DESCRIPTION>THE QUAKER LONG TERM INCENTIVE OF 1999
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>The Quaker Long Term Incentive of 1999</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><B>Exhibit 10.17
</B></FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><B>FIRST AMENDMENT </B></FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><B>TO THE </B></FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000"><B>QUAKER LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN OF 1999 </B></FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3"
COLOR="#000000">WHEREAS, The Quaker Long Term Incentive Plan of 1999 (the &#147;Plan&#148;), was established by The Quaker Oats Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) for the benefit of its eligible employees; and </FONT></P><P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">WHEREAS, amendment of the Plan is desirable to eliminate the
